TITLE_CONTRACT.P: Hiring of agency for temporary employment services

SHORT_CONTRACT_DESCRIPTION.P: Presented in the technical specification (description of services)

LEGAL_FORM.P: — statement from the economic operator confirming that in the last 5 years it has not received final verdict for participation in criminal organization, corruption, fraud or money laundering,
— confirmation that no bankruptcy procedure has been initiated, issued by relevant authority,
— confirmation that no liquidation procedure has been initiated, issued by relevant authority,
— confirmation of paid taxes, contributions and other public fees issued by relevant authority from the country where the economic operator is incorporated,

— confirmation from the Registry of penalties for committed criminal offences by legal entities, verifying that the legal entity has not been served with secondary verdict for ban from public procurement participation, awards of public procurement contracts and public-private partnerships,

— confirmation from the Registry of penalties for committed criminal offences by legal entities, verifying that the legal entity has not been served with secondary verdict for temporary or permanent ban from performing a particular activity,
— confirmation that there is no final verdict enforcing misdemeanor sanction — ban from performing profession, activity or duty, specifically, temporary ban from performing a particular activity.

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: Document of registered activity form and valid license “A” for conducting temporary employment in accordance with the Law for temporary employment agencies (“Official Gazette of Republic of Macedonia” number 49/06; 102/08; 145/10; 136/11 and 13/13), issued by the Ministry of labor and social policy.

T_CAPACITY_INFORMATION.P: The bidder, through its own agency, must have minimum engagement of 250 persons during each month in 2017.

T_CAPACITY_MIN_LEVEL.P: Confirmation issued by the Employment Agency of Republic of Macedonia for the number of relinquished persons on monthly level during 2017 or M-PIN declaration for each month individually for 2017

USE_ELECTRONIC_AUCTION.P: The Contracting Authority will use electronic auction through the Electronic System for Public Procurement as last phase of the open procedure. The subject of the electronic auction is the provision presented in % (percentage). The starting price of the electronic action is the lowest agency provision excluding VAT, presented in % (percentage) from the gross value of the invoiced amount from the acceptable offers submitted during the first phase of the procedure. After full evolution of the initial offers, invitations for participation in the electronic auction will be delivered in electronic form through the Electronic System for Public Procurement to all economic operators which submitted acceptable offers in the first phase and are registered with active user profile in the Electronic System for Public Procurement. The electronic auction invitation will be sent electronically to the user’s Electronic System for Public Procurement mailbox of each entity that submitted offer electronically for the subject procedure. The electronic auction invitation will have the following information: starting price of the auction, specifically the lowest offered price from the initial offers, date and time of start and end of the auction, the price interval of negative offering (the minimum and maximum difference in offered prices). In case of only one offer or one acceptable offer submitted, the contracting authority will be obligated to invite the sole bidder to submit final price through the Electronic System for Public Procurement. The invitation for submitting final price includes the following information: Identification of the lot that will subject to submission of final price, information that will be available before the submission of the final price and the time period for submission of final price. The sole bidder will submit the final price only once within the defined time and in case the final price is not submitted, the originally offered price will be considered as final.
